comment._content: Grand Duchess Olga Nikolaevna of Russia en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Duchess_Olga_Nikolaevna_of_Ru... "Her chief characteristics ... were a strong will and a singularly straightforward habit of thought and action", wrote her mother's friend Anna Vyrubova, who recalled Olga's hot temper and her struggles to keep it under control. She definitely looks all that and more

comment._content: yes, the oldest of the 4 girls
